thread.title: Watch: Experian Hack Exposes T-Mobile Customers
thread.title_full: Watch: Experian Hack Exposes T-Mobile Customers

title: Watch: Experian Hack Exposes T-Mobile Customers
text:
Published By: ABC News: Technology - Today 
The breach at Experian has exposed the personal information of as many as 15 million T-Mobile customers, according to the mobile carrier....
